description:
Most Python devs are familiar with built-in profiling tools like
cProfile, but the world of profilers has expanded rapidly. In this
hands-on workshop we'll explore various open-source profiling
technologies with different overhead and accuracy tradeoffs, as well as
several ways of visualizing profile data like flow charts, call trees,
and flamegraphs.
title: Python Profiling State of the World (Sponsor: Sentry)
